about_the_game:
Background

Life in exile was empty until founding The Spare Talons. Now there's not a day without a job. Join the Captain in his quest for revenge as he recruits his crew, outfits their ships, and takes down a rotten regime while collecting a paycheck.

Gameplay

In Kamikaze Tactics you will:

Devise unique strategies to outmaneuver your opponents.

Compose your squadron from a variety of pilots and units, all with unique abilities, strengths, and weaknesses.
Once in battle, plan your movements while thinking turns ahead to maintain a positional advantage and outflank your enemies.

Shields beat missiles. Armor beats kinetics. Energy weapons split the difference.

Combat doesn't end with good positioning. Your weaponry matters too.
With a variety of weapons systems at your disposal, you will find yourself making decisions to apply the best tools to the job.

The world fights back.

Arenas come with modifiers from artillery fire to signal jamming which will force you to alter your gameplay and test your mastery.

Each run is unique.

You will meet different crew members, fight different bosses, and discover more character interactions with every playthrough.
